mapper.select: select curp.id, curp.spart_amount , curp.part_id, curp.spart_sum , csp.name as spartName, csp.sale_price as price, csp.serial_no as code, csp.type, cmt.name as typeName, csp.unit_uom as unit, cd.name as unitName, cdd.name as locationName from cus_upkeep_record_part curp LEFT JOIN cus_materiel csp ON curp.part_id=csp.id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary cd ON csp.unit_uom=cd.id LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location cdd ON cdd.id = csp.default_location LEFT JOIN cus_materiel_type cmt on csp.type=cmt.id WHERE curp.record_id=#{id}

select curp.id, curp.spart_amount, csp.unit_uom as spart_unitid, a.name as spart_unit, curp.part_id, curp.spart_sum, csp.name as spartName,
curp.spart_price as price, csp.serial_no as code, csp.specification as type, cdd.name as locationName, curp.remark from cus_upkeep_record_part curp LEFT JOIN cus_materiel csp ON curp.part_id=csp.id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary cd ON csp.unit_uom=cd.id LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location cdd ON csp.default_location=cdd.id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary a ON csp.unit_uom=a.id WHERE curp.record_id=#{id}
